name: Solitaire Tourist
description:
Solitaire Tourist is a well designed mobile card game based on the classic solitaire gameplay as we all love. Jump into a world of brain-teasing fun, and leave with your heart filled with nostalgia, it is the true spirit of the classic solitaire (also known as Klondike or Patience).

Free to play game, you can start a pleasant Solitaire Journey while touring to the most beautiful sceneries all over the world. The beautiful wallpaper will take you to explore the world, just like a relaxing holiday. More than static pictures, there are wrinkling stars on the night sky, flowing waterfall pouring from mountains, breeze flying over flowers.

Despite of beautiful wallpaper, Solitaire Tourist is a well designed game to have a smooth and modern feel and still with some classic, Klondike Solitaire game elements we all love.

Enjoy Some of The Thrilling Features:
* Collections of Beautiful wallpapers waiting to unlock
* Daily challenges with different levels
* Single tap or drag & drop to move cards
* Left-handed mode
* Magic wand, undo moves and hints
* Auto place, Auto complete
* Play online or offline. No WIFI required

HIGHLIGHTS
- Based on the Classic Solitaire gameplay
- Beautiful Wallpapers with dynamic effects
- Customized cards font style and back style
- Magic wand to uncover hidden cards

Download NOW to let the fun begin! Be a happy Solitaire Tourist!

If you have any questions, complaints, requests or comments, please contact us at solitairetourist@outlook.com
